dev.jeka.core.tool

Class JkRepoConfigOptionLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.jeka.core.tool.JkRepoConfigOptionLoader

  • public class JkRepoConfigOptionLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static methods for defining JkRepoSet from JkOptions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JkRepoConfigOptionLoader

        public JkRepoConfigOptionLoader()

    • Method Detail

      • publishRepository

        public static JkRepo publishRepository()
        Returns repository where are published artifacts. By default it takes the repository defined in options repo.publish.url, repo.publish.username and repo.publish.password .

        You can select another repository defined in option by setting repo.publishname option. So if you want to select the repository defined as repo.myRepo.url in your options, set option repo.publishname=myRepo.

        This methods returns null if no matching option found

      • downloadRepository

        public static JkRepo downloadRepository()
        Returns the repositories where are downloaded dependencies. By default it takes the repository defined in options repo.download.url, repo.publish.username and repo.download.password .

        You can select another repository defined in option by setting repo.downloadname option. So if you want to select the repository defined as repo.myRepo.url in your options, set option repo.downloadname=myRepo.

        This methods returns an empy repos if no matching options found.

      • defRepository

        public static JkRepo defRepository()
        Returns the repositories where are downloaded dependencies needed to execute the Jeka run.

      • repoFromOptions

        public static JkRepo repoFromOptions(java.lang.String repoName)
        Creates JkRepo form Jeka options. the specified repository name will be turned to repo.[repoName].url, repo.[repoName].username and repo.[repoName].password options for creating according repository.

      • allRepositoryOptions

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> allRepositoryOptions()
